content: catventurous crochet simple and fun crochet patterns the #fashionablycatventurous supermeowdel catventurer melba @catventurepussmelba welcome to this beginner-friendly video tutorial for our 70s retro crochet cat bandana thanks so much for watching and happy crocheting materials yarn of your choice in 5 colours i used 3 weight acrylic and acrylic/wool blends * crochet hook to suit your yarn i used 3 5mm * darning needle * scissors * measuring tape optional stitches/techniques * making a magic_ring magic_ring * making a chain * double_crochet double_crochet * half_double_crochet half_double_crochet * single_crochet single_crochet * slip_stitch sl st * changing colour * tying on * weaving in ends **important these bandanas are intended to be stylish and fun for you and your cat for their safety please supervise your cat at all times while they are wearing this bandana or any other item that secures around the neck or within which claws may become entangled **
